page.title: 07GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: The games I play are Sardines,hide and seek,two balley, tiggy and skipping. I also play{"LACCAS"} (elastics),higher and higher, leap frog and polo.Elastics is my favourite. Two people hold a large loop of elastic around their ankles and another person has to jump in and out of them. If you trip over or stand on the elastic when you aren't meant to, or miss it ,you have to hold the elastic. The elastic gets higher and higher every time. The rhyme we use to sing is:_ {"England.Ireland, { Scotland,Wales. { Inside,Outside, { Inside,On."} When we said "On!",you have to jump on the elastic.
